A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don’t get what all you do ‘so called Star Wars fans’ are moaning about. You got your action and your quality. So what Disney own Star Wars - it means more funding for a die hard franchise that TRUE FANS will love and support no matter what. I personally LOVED this film. It’s definitely a step forward in comparison to episodes 1\,2 and 3 as it explores the future of our beloved characters - **SPOILER** yes Luke dies\, but this had to happen in order to create a plot that could be carried through to the next film. Besides just because he’s dead doesn’t mean he’s gone. After all they killed off Yoda in episode 5 and we still continue to see him in future movies. Therefore I can argue this to be one of the best movies of the year and a MUST SEE!!!
